name: Impending Bacon
description:
You are a drone sent into space to help power up an abandoned spaceship which goes by the name of SS.Laughterhouse. Navigate this small crafty maze to find the one power cell that will bring the cows home! Oh, be careful though. They say that the ship is a little bit haunted by the farm animal(s) left there long ago...

Instructions from maker:

- Use the mouse to move around

- WASD to move

- E to Interact with items

- Q to drop items

- Hold Shift to sprint. Watch your stamina!!

- Escape to pause

- Avoid the farm animal(s) chasing you!

- Collect the power cell and place into the power bank to win!

(**Note: You'll want to press 'E' to put the power cell onto the power bank!)

Good luck.
